mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into videoinfo (userId, title, pictureurl, urls, praiseNum, readNum, commentNum, avgscore, creatStamp, isTop, visitNum, tag ) values (#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pictureurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{praisenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{readnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{avgscore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creatstamp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{istop,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{visitnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update videoinfo set userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pictureurl = #{pictureurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, urls = #{urls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, praiseNum = #{praisenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, readNum = #{readnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, commentNum = #{commentnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, avgscore = #{avgscore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creatStamp = #{creatstamp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, isTop = #{istop,jdbcType=INTEGER}, visitNum = #{visitnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tag = #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where videoid = #{videoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select videoid, userId, title, pictureurl, urls, praiseNum, readNum, commentNum, avgscore, creatStamp, isTop, visitNum, tag from videoinfo where videoid = #{videoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select videoid, userId, title, pictureurl, urls, praiseNum, readNum, commentNum, avgscore, creatStamp, isTop, visitNum, tag from videoinfo

select videoid, videoinfo.userId, title, pictureurl, urls, praiseNum, readNum, commentNum, avgscore, creatStamp, isTop, visitNum, tag from history, videoinfo where history.userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and history.contentId = concat('V', videoinfo.videoid) and history.isCollected = 1
select videoid, userId, title, pictureurl, urls, praiseNum, readNum, commentNum, avgscore, creatStamp, isTop, visitNum, tag from videoinfo where videoinfo.userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select videoid, videoinfo.userId, title, pictureurl, urls, praiseNum, readNum, commentNum, avgscore, creatStamp, isTop, visitNum, tag from videoinfo, history where history.userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and history.contentId = concat('V', videoinfo.videoid)
select videoid, title, pictureurl, urls, praiseNum, readNum, commentNum, avgscore, creatStamp, isTop, userId, visitNum, tag from videoinfo order by (visitNum+0.2*commentNum)*avgscore desc
